channel.title: STFT on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in STFT on Datumorphism

item.title: Short-Time-Fourier-Transform
item.description: Short-Time-Fourier-Transform We Fourier transform the time series data using a Fourier transform, with some window function \begin{equation} \tilde Y[n,k] = \sum_m Y[n+m] W[m] e^{-i \lambda_k m}, \end{equation} where $\lambda_k=2\pi k/N$ and $W[m]$ is the window function at $m$. References and Notes Cousera
